text: Solomon Simmons starts over the hurdles in the 2018 World Championships in Doha, Qatar Solomon Simmons (born September 26, 1993) is an American athlete, specializing in decathlon. Simmons attended Eastern Michigan University from 2011-2016 where he was a two time Mid American Conference Champion in the decathlon and heptathlon. Simmons finished his collegiate career with a 6th place finish at the 2016 Olympic Trials. After finishing second at 2018 USA Track & Field Outdoor Championships, he confirmed this second, with a personal best of 8,227 points, at the 2019 US Championships in Des Moines, qualifying for 2019 World Championships in Doha. He has been married twice. He was first married to Macy Houghtlin. ==References== *IAAF Athlete’s profile Category:American male decathletes Category:Living people Category:1993 births
title: Solomon Simmons
